content.rendered:
Air Macau Company Limited is the flag carrier airline of Macau. It operates services to 23 destinations in Mainland China, Japan, South Korea, Philippines, Thailand, Taiwan and Vietnam, as well as regional international services, from its hub at Macau International Airport. It was founded on 1994. In 2014, Air Macau carried 2.12 million passengers with an average load factor of 68.20% and carried 15,900 tonnes of cargo and mail.

 

Air Macau Airlines Osaka, Japan Address : 6f Osaka Sakaisuji Bldg., 2-2-13 Bakuromachi, Chuo-ku, Osaka, Japan 541-0059

Phone number : 81-6-62635383

Email : info@airmacau.jp

Business hours : Monday To Friday 09:00 – 13:00 ; 14:00 – 18:00 (rest Public Holiday)

Air Macau Airlines Official website : http://www.airmacau.com.mo

Air Macau Airlines Hand | Cabin, Checked, Excess Baggage Allowance

Check the above link for Air Macau Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges.

View list of all Air Macau Airlines Offices

Queries handled by Air Macau Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class,Phoenix Miles

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Macau Airlines Osaka, Japan Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Macau Airlines Osaka, Japan: (click on the stars below)
